body:
This the culprit: https://github.com/go-openapi/loads/commit/0d17535daa37578ec3b60494288bd3164cb9a36b

The new spec cloning using gob instead of json fails to properly clone spec.Ref structures.
Added a custom gob encoder/decoder for Ref. Looks like it works. Will finish the testing later.
@kenjones-cisco there are pending PR in go-openapi/spec (the fixer) and go-openapi/loads (the verifier) to solve this issue. I'll update go-swagger vendor as soon as those are merged. Thanks.

issue.title: Fix go-swagger/go-swagger#1816
issue.body:
Fix regression on unmarshalling Ref types by using gob encode/decode

* Contributes go-swagger/go-swagger#1816

Signed-off-by: Frederic BIDON <fredbi@yahoo.com>

issue.title: Acknowledge fixed go-swagger/go-swagger#1816
issue.body:
* Added test to make sure regression go-swagger/go-swagger#1816 is fixed by gob decoder in go-openapi/spec
* Contributes go-swagger/go-swagger#1816

NOTE: requires go-openapi/spec#87

Signed-off-by: Frederic BIDON <fredbi@yahoo.com>

issue.title: Acknowledge fix #1816 with go-openapi updates
issue.body:
* update vendor:  go-openapi/spec, go-openapi/loads
* fixes #1816 

~~> NOTE: this is WIP and would require go-openapi/spec#87 and go-openapi/loads#22 to be merged.~~ 

Signed-off-by: Frederic BIDON <fredbi@yahoo.com>

issue.title: Regression with gob encoder optimization
issue.body:
## Problem statement

Since go-openapi/loads adopted gob to deep clone specs (commit: https://github.com/go-openapi/loads/pull/19/commits/0d17535daa37578ec3b60494288bd3164cb9a36b), some regressions occurred on spec objects which have custom json marshalling.

A first regression on "$ref" (bug: #1816) has been fixed with #1818.

Another one on "security" object has been found when analyzing #1817.

We need to add some more GobEncode/GobDecode in go-openapi/spec to ensure this optimization causes no more regression.

## Swagger specification
https://github.com/go-swagger/go-swagger/blob/master/examples/generated/swagger.json

## Steps to reproduce
Regenerate examples, observe diff.
Observe that:
```yaml
security: 
  api_key: []
```

becomes:
```yaml
security: 
  api_key: null
```
## Environment
swagger version:  current master
go version: 1.11
OS:   ubuntu
